prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a sleek body and long fins that resemble ribbons.
I want an adorable aquatic creature that swims gracefully with blue tones and gentle features.
Generate a small Pokemon that has a round shape and an elongated tail, perfect for ocean environments.
Make a whimsical Pokemon that has a soft blue color and playful demeanor, ideal for children.
Imagine a serene water Pokemon that floats effortlessly and has comforting personality traits.
Design a Pokemon with a smooth appearance and gentle curves, showcasing shades of blue and aqua.
Show me a friendly Pokemon that embodies calmness and tranquility, with a cute, rounded body.
